mean_cn: n. 安慰物，贿赂，回扣；  v. 浸湿，湿透
mean_en: something that is done or given to someone in order to prevent trouble, gain support, etc.
short_phrase: sop up the sweat on his face
sentence: I'm trying to sop up all my sweat with this towel, but it just isn't working.
sentence_trans: 我试图用这条毛巾来吸干所有汗水，但没有成功。
